rukus.text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Ō fushin-sha-tachi yo
watashi wa, anata gata ga agameru mono o agamenai
Anata gata wa, watashi ga agameru mono o, agameru-sha-tachide wanai
Watashi wa, anata gata ga agamete kita mono no, sūhai-shade wanai
Anata gata wa, watashi ga agamete kita mono no, sūhai-shade wanai
Anata gata ni wa, anata gata no shūkyō ga ari, watashi ni wa, watashi no shūkyō ga aru nodearu
